content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)
- Burner mining drill (position y2)

### Iron gear wheel crafting setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items without required ingredients
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-plates are required to craft iron gear wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
